sourcesContent: import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { Formik, Form } from 'formik' import ServiAddNote from '../../services/serviceAddNote' function AddNoteModal({activeModal, cerrarModal, reload}) { //ADD NOTE VALUES const [valuesNote,setValuesNote] = useState({ titleNote: "", contentNote: "" }) const handletitleNote = (event) => { const { value } = event.target; setValuesNote({...valuesNote, titleNote: value }); } const handlecontentNote = (event) => { const { value } = event.target; setValuesNote({...valuesNote, contentNote: value }); } const handleReloadModal=()=>{ setValuesNote({titleNote: "", contentNote: ""}) } return ( <>
